name: acoomh-landing-page
description: AcoomH Landing Page with automated cache busting

scripts.server: node -e "const express = require('express'); const path = require('path'); const app = express(); app.use(express.static('.')); app.listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:3000'));"
scripts.deploy: node build.js && echo 'Ready for deployment! Upload all files to your hosting service.'

author: AcoomH Team
